body: When you realize that there's a manga timeline of this one....and it's a version just without the ugly bastard and everything doujin has....maybe, that is. Maybe.

according to the author, this sasha is not the same as the one that fucks the fatso, or the one that fucks for porn. She's not a virgin tho but if you like NTR, there's a "alternative version" of this one that NTR her master with a high school scumbag
No, Sasha is not a virgin even in this timeline. She just hasn't met her fatass boyfriend.
The doujins with the little boy are a separate timeline. Sasha-chan is still a virgin here.
I wonder if the other stories are canon in this lovey universe between Sasha and her sensei.
Poor little brat who always has his girlfriend's doujin hanging out with all kinds of disgusting guys and the only one he has a lead role he doesn't even do anything poor thing 😔
Ahh! This is too adorable! I need a translation!
